main.name: Gurvir Dehal
main.description: I'm currently studying Computer Science at UBC.
main.bio: I'm currently studying Computer Science at UBC in Vancouver, British Columbia. I'm passionate in learning about all areas of Computer Science ranging from low-level hardware/software to web/mobile development to machine learning.
main.contactmessage: Want to get in touch? Send me a message!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Major in Computer Science. Achieved Dean's List 2017 - 2020

work.title: Web Application Developer Intern
work.description: Responsible for using tools such as Vue.js, React, npm and webpack in order to build a large-scale JavaScript application that teachers use in their lessons in classrooms around the world. Practiced agile development and worked with a large highly interactive team, including the testing team to ensure quality code by doing code reviews and writing unit tests using Mocha and Sinon.js.

projects.title: Tweetable Coffee Machine
projects.category: A coffee machine that works by tweeting at it!

testimonials.text: Gurvir is a self starter and technically proficient.  He was able to learn on the fly and was very productive very quickly upon joining the team.
